content.text:
# List of international guests hosted by President Alexander Stubb

List of international guests hosted by President of Finland Alexander Stubb. The list includes mainly people who are mentioned in the press releases of the Office of the President of the Republic of Finland.
2024
{| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%; text-align:center; background:#FFFFF0"
|-
| style="background:#8CA7C4;" colspan=10 |International guests hosted by President Alexander Stubb in 2024.
|-

!width=120 style=background:#BED9F6| Date
!width=260 style=background:#BED9F6| Guest
!width=110 style=background:#BED9F6| Country/Organization
!width=260 style=background:#BED9F6| Reason for visit
!width=140 style=background:#BED9F6| Other
!width=80 style=background:#BED9F6| References
|-
| 1. || 2024 || 5–6 June || Jens Stoltenberg, Secretary General of NATO ||  NATO || Security and defence policy issues, the situation in Ukraine and the forthcoming NATO summit || ||
|-
| 2. || 2024 || 13–14 June || Baiba Braže, Foreign minister of Latvia,Espen Barth Eide, Foreign minister of Norway,Gabrielius Landsbergis, Foreign minister of Lithuania,Mark Rutte, Prime minister of the Netherlands,Radosław Sikorski, Foreign minister of Poland ||  Latvia, Norway,  Lithuania,  The Netherlands,  Poland || Kultaranta Talks || ||
|-
| 3. || 2024 || 4–5 September || Tamim bin Hamad Al Thani, Emir of Qatar ||  Qatar || Economic and political cooperation between the two countries, the ongoing wars in Ukraine and Gaza|| ||
|-
| 4. || 2024 || 19 September || Filippo Grandi, United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees ||  UNHCR ||  || ||
|}
